overview: Like the mythological river that spawned their name, Styx runs deep. All 11 tracks, here are full-length album versions: their hits Babe; The Best of Times; Mr. Roboto; Show Me the Way; Come Sail Away; Too Much Time on My Hands; Lorelei; Blue Collar Man (Long Nights) , and more!
title: Styx: 20th Century Masters
